data.name: Biotope
data.detailed_description:
Biotope will be the most detailed and realistic aquarium
simulator on the market

Besides enjoying, watching and placing items, users will have
many possibilities to customize and use their own tanks.

Biotope makes it possible to create complex aquaristic
ecosystems and simulate realistic life cycles of plants and fish.

It will also be possible to just play in sandbox mode
to create tanks that wouldn’t be possible in real life.

Features:


  • Single player simulation and sandbox mode

  • Tutorial with extensive aquarist wiki

  • Campaign mode with different kinds of quests to solve

  • Cooperative and competitive multiplayer modes

  • Photorealistic animated fish models

data.short_description: Biotope will be the most detailed and realistic aquarium simulator on the market. Biotope makes it possible to create complex aquaristic ecosystems and simulate realistic life cycles of plants and fish.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 8.1
  • Processor: AMD Athlon II @ 2x 3.0 GHz / i3-5005U @ 4x 2.00 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 650 / AMD Radeon HD 7700
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: System requirements are not yet fully tested and may change.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: i5-3450 CPU @ 4x 3.10 GHz / AMD FX-6100 @ 6x 3.3 GHz
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS Sierra 10.12.6
  • Processor: i5-4278U @ 4x 2,6 GHz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris 1536 MB / AMD Radeon 530
  • Storage: 8 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS High Sierra 10.13.6
  • Processor: i5-4670 @ 4x 3,4 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 775M
  • Storage: 8 MB available space
